name: MKLocalSearchCompleter
desc: A utility object for generating a list of completion strings based on a partial search string that you provide.

items.name: var delegate: MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate?
items.desc: The object that receives the completion results.

items.name: protocol MKLocalSearchCompleterDelegate
items.desc: Defines the methods for receiving search completion data.

items.name: var queryFragment: String
items.desc: The search string for which you want completions.

items.name: var region: MKCoordinateRegion
items.desc: The region that defines the geographic scope of the search.

items.name: var resultTypes: MKLocalSearchCompleter.ResultType
items.desc: The types of search completions to include.

items.name: var pointOfInterestFilter: MKPointOfInterestFilter?
items.desc: A filter that lists point of interest categories to include or exclude in the search.

items.name: struct MKLocalSearchCompleter.ResultType
items.desc: Options that indicate types of search completions.

items.name: var isSearching: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether a search operation is in progress.

items.name: var results: [MKLocalSearchCompletion]
items.desc: The most recently received search completions.
